release.action: Enable to run basic mvn command from any module whithout the problem of missing header file.
Updating tycho version to 0.26.0, to have a better support for surefire and target files See https://wiki.eclipse.org/Tycho/Release_Notes/0.26
All the fixes can be found here: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/buglist.cgi?classification=Modeling&product=Papyrus&component=Components&target_milestone=
Updating the publish script to remove the downloads item
All the fixes can be found here: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/buglist.cgi?classification=Modeling&product=Papyrus&component=Components&target_milestone=
Creation of the component main pom
All the fixes can be found here: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/buglist.cgi?classification=Modeling&product=Papyrus&component=Components&target_milestone=
